author: Sam Paul A.
title: Alappuzha survivor says the lockdown will pay off
description: Wuhan-returnee recounts his experience in China and the recovery back home
content:
He had his first tryst with a lockdown in the Chinese city of Wuhan, ground zero of the COVID-19 outbreak.
After receiving a text message in the early hours of January 23, he, along with his friends, scrambled to reach the Wuhan Tianhe international airport … [+2231 chars]
